title: Met Gala 2024: Alia Bhatt, Zendaya, Jennifer Lopez And Others Flaunt Dreamy Fashion On The Red Carpet, Pics!
body:
The Met Gala, an annual extravaganza of high fashion and celebrity culture, never fails to captivate with its themes and spectacular red-carpet moments. In 2024, the theme is"The Garden of Time" and this year's gala also marks the opening of the Costume Institute's spring exhibition, titled "Sleeping Beauties: Reawakening Fashion.

This has swept attendees into a dreamy realm where fashion's slumbering beauty was stirred awake. As stars including Alia Bhatt, Zendaya, Jennifer Lopez and others descended upon the iconic steps of the Metropolitan Museum of Art, they unveiled their interpretations of this enchanting theme, breathing new life into the world of couture and style.

Here's a list of celebs with their fairytale-inspired creations at the Met Gala's red carpet in 2024.

Alia Bhatt

Alia Bhatt mesmerized onlookers as she floated down the Met Gala's red carpet in a stunning mint green sequin saree by Sabyasachi, reminiscent of a blooming garden in springtime. The intricately crafted floral appliques added a touch of whimsy to the traditional ensemble, while her effortless grace and charm elevated the look to ethereal heights. With each step, she embodied the essence of reawakening beauty, captivating all with her timeless elegance and modern flair.

Zendaya

Zendaya graced the Met Gala in a mesmerizing peacock blue one-shoulder dress by Maison Margiela Artisanal, crafted by the legendary John Galliano. Accompanied by a matching hat adorned with feathers, she exuded regal elegance and avant-garde flair. Dramatic makeup, featuring striking blue lipstick, complemented her ensemble flawlessly. With Christian Louboutin's shoes completing the look, Zendaya commanded the red carpet with poise and grace, effortlessly embodying the intersection of artistry and fashion at this illustrious event.

Jennifer Lopez

Jennifer Lopez graced the Met Gala in a mesmerizing Schiaparelli Haute Couture ensemble, adorned with dazzling Tiffany & Co. jewellery. Embracing a natural makeup look, she radiated effortless beauty, while her chic messy bun hairdo added a touch of casual elegance to the extravagant affair. Lopez's confident stride and impeccable style captured the essence of modern glamour, solidifying her status as a fashion icon whose presence lights up any red carpet with unparalleled grace and allure.

Kim Kardashian

Kim Kardashian looked fabulous in a sheer Margiela by John Galliano dress with a lace train featuring leaves and floral accents and wrapped herself up with a simple grey shawl. Her icy bleach-blonde hair perfectly accented the silver in her dress and the reality star played down the rest of the look by wearing natural waves and subtle makeup!

Gigi Hadid

Gigi Hadid dazzled in a custom Thom Browne creation at the Met Gala, donning a pristine white off-shoulder dress adorned with floral swirls that sculpted a captivating silhouette, accentuated by a flowy train. Her classic bob hairstyle framed her face with timeless elegance, while glossy makeup added a radiant finish. The American supermodel epitomized ethereal beauty and grace, leaving a trail of enchantment on the red carpet.

Emily Ratajkowski

Emily Ratajkowski stunned in a stunning sparkly sheer gown by Versace, featuring a daring backless design that accentuated her silhouette with effortless glamour. Her choice of nude makeup added a touch of sophistication, allowing the gown to take centre stage. Completing the look was a chic centre-parted bun hairdo, framing her face with elegance and highlighting her radiant beauty. Ratajkowski epitomized modern elegance and allure on the Met Gala red carpet.

Anna Wintour

Anna Wintour, Vogue magazine editor and the iconic queen of fashion, made a statement in a Loewe white gown adorned with striking black floral appliques at the Met Gala. Her signature bob framed her face with timeless elegance as she glided across the red carpet, exuding sophistication and authority. The contrast of the black florals against the pristine white fabric created a captivating visual harmony, showcasing Wintour's impeccable taste and unwavering influence in the world of style.

Ashley Graham

Ashley Graham stunned in a striking black corset dress by Ludovic de Saint Sernin at the Met Gala, featuring a daring halter neckline and a mesmerizingly long train cascading down her back. Accentuated by Jared jewellery, her ensemble exuded sensuality and sophistication. With matte makeup enhancing her natural beauty and a chic bang-up bun hairstyle, Graham epitomized modern glamour, effortlessly commanding attention and leaving a lasting impression on the red carpet with confidence and style.
